package.name: ActionBar Reborn
package.shortDescription: 键盘底部显示[撤销] [选择] [粘贴]按钮。Undo, redo, select all, copy, cut and paste actions on bottom of keyboard. ActionBar Free Reborn Edition

descriptionlist.description:
## 键盘底部显示
### [撤销] [选择] [粘贴] 按钮
- Undo, redo, select all, copy, cut and paste actions on bottom of keyboard.
- ActionBar Free Reborn Edition
